# gtag

Git tag shortcut. A bash script bundled with npm.

## Installation

```
$ npm i -g gtag
```

## Usage

```sh
$ gtag
Git tag shortcut

Usage:
  $ gtag <tag>

Example:
  $ gtag 1.0.0
```
